item.description:
Join us for a Webinar on Tuesday, March 19 at 7 PM EDT



This trading room is a rare find. It's excellent.

Get the Eminis next Move with Ultra Precise Buy/Sell Levels!

The room is open for only 2 hours each morning and sometimes the profit goal is reached early.

NOTE: RSVP in the right column here in Meetup       PLUS register at GoToMeeting at this link:
https://www1.gotomeeting.com/register/816591552

 

Increase your daily profits and learn how to...
• Follow the Markets Current Trading Trend
• Trade using Highly Accurate Support and Resistance Levels
• Execute Nearly Perfect Trades using the "Trade the Trend" Strategy
• Make a Full Time Income Trading only a Few Hours a Day!

The Emini Futures are the most exciting markets to trade today! They have very low costs, are inflation and recession proof, can be traded both long and short, can be traded from anywhere nearly 24 hours a day, and have a huge profit potential. For more information about trading the Emini Futures go to our website http://www.TradeTheEmini.com

During this Webinar you'll learn how to make consistent profits day trading the Emini Futures with topics that include:
• Analyzing  the Relationship between the Markets, "The KEY to Your Success"
• A Simple 4-step Trading Plan you can use to become a Consistent Trader
• 6-steps for a better Entry every time
• Using Good Money Management to exit your trade and keep your profit
• How to use a Stop Loss and Trailing Stops to maximize profits

About the Presenter:
John Szymczak is a professional Trader with over 30 years experience in the financial markets. His "Trade the Trend" system and program finds the daily support and resistance levels for the S&P, DOW, NASDAQ and RUSSELL emini indices. You'll receive this information before the U.S. Cash Markets open along with a complete trading plan which includes entry, exit and stop loss information for each index. You'll also have access to the Morning Trading Room where you can follow Professional Traders as they setup and discuss each trading opportunity.


To see what others are saying about this system visit:

http://www.tradetheemini.com/Testimonials.html

John Szymczak - Momentum Trading Systems

Website: http://www.TradeTheEmini.com

Title: Trading the Emini Futures

Date: Tuesday, March 19, 2013

Time: 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM EDT

After registering you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the Webinar.

System Requirements
PC-based attendees
Required: Windows® 7, Vista, XP or 2003 Server
Mac®-based attendees
Required: Mac OS® X 10.6 or newer

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies

item.name: Webinar: Momentum Trading Tuesday March 19th at 6 PM for GREAT Trading Room
